title: Is it possible to have 2 duos on the same team, in a ranked solo queue match?

replies.body: No you cant question gets asked heaps and have never seen it once in over 2k games.
If your thinking of having 2 duos(friends) I think that works, I'm not sure.
pretty sure he means if does solo queue is it possible the other 4 players are 2 duo pairs
Oh well, yes I'm pretty sure it would be possible.
